thread.title: Michael Feinstein Lists Los Angeles Mansion for $26 Million

author: Katherine Clarke
title: Michael Feinstein Lists Los Angeles Mansion for $26 Million
text:
Michael Feinstein, an entertainer and a longtime proponent of American standard songs, is listing his Tudor Revival-style mansion in Los Angelesâ€™s Los Feliz area for $26 million.
Completed in 1926, the approximately 15,227-square-foot building served as the Russian Consulate from 1935 to the early 1950s, Mr. Feinstein said. The singer, who is known for his versions of songs by the likes of Cole Porter and the Gershwins, said he has hosted numerous parties at the property, and guests have included actors Warren Beatty, Annette...
